data.name: DreadOut 2
data.detailed_description:
A unique take on third person action adventure survival horror with Indonesian supernatural in veins. Mixed gameplay of city exploring, “DreadOut” style smartphone ghost hunting and new action packed battle within DreadOut supernatural world.

FEATURES:

NON LINEAR SURVIVAL HORROR


  • Explore enticing little town, night and day to solve terrifying urban legends that haunt within.
  • Interact with various unique NPCs and tons of side-quests.
  • Banish ghost with smart-phone equipped in classic DreadOut style.

ACTION FANTASY HORROR

  • Delve deeper in DreadOut supernatural world with new action packed battle mechanic.
  • Battle hideous bosses that roamed in the supernatural world.
  • Consume demon's spirits and absorb their dozen unique abilities / weapons at your disposal.

data.short_description: Second installment of a third person action adventure survival horror with Indonesian supernatural in veins. Mixed gameplay of city exploring, “DreadOut” style smartphone ghost hunting and new action packed battle within DreadOut supernatural world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5 3570K / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 770 with 2GB VRAM / Radeon R9 280X 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

content_descriptors.notes: Intense horror, fear themes and some topics are related into mature suggestive themes, sexual assault, violent and use of tobacco.
